# **Plant pathology (page under construction)**

I had the opportunity to TA plant pathology for two consecutive years at Oregon State University with [Dr. Ken Johnson](https://bpp.oregonstate.edu/people/johnson-ken). One of the requirements of Ph.D. at OSU is students have to TA for at least two terms.
